statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ADJS_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.ADJS_ID , dbo.DateCharToChar10(AA.ADJS_DATE) AS ADJS_DATE , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.ADJS_QTY , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.INVENTORY_ADJS AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ADJS_DATE >= #ST_ADJS_DATE#
AND AA.ADJS_DATE <= #ED_ADJS_DATE#
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.ADJS_ID , AA.ADJS_DATE , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.ADJS_QTY , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.INVENTORY_ADJS AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.ADJS_ID = #ADJS_ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UBZ.INVENTORY_ADJS ( ADJS_DATE, PRODUCT_ID, ADJS_QTY, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #ADJS_DATE#, #PRODUCT_ID#, #ADJS_QTY#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ADJS_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UBZ.INVENTORY_ADJS SET ADJS_DATE = #ADJS_DATE# , PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID# , ADJS_QTY = #ADJS_QTY# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ADJS_ID = #ADJS_ID#
